positions.comment: Wind on the nose!  78 NM to Ponta Del Gada.
Arrived Ponta Del Gada Sao Miquel Acores.; 10 days 19 hrs!; Muito Bom!
Under way for Isla Faial; Next stop Horta!; The Holy Grail!
; Arrived Horta, Faial.; Party time!; Expect depart August 10.
A great trip to Isla Das Flores--Then back to Horta for Sea Week;
Back in Horta.; Sea Week begins Friday Night!
Stck in Sao Miguel w Immigration problems and waiting weather.  ; Headwinds !
Depart Acores for Madiera!; Under Way!
Plenty of wind last night.  Lots of sail drill all night.
Arrived Porto Santo, Madiera Group.; 7 days 6hrs.
Arrived Porto Santo, Madiera Group.; 7 days 6hrs.
150 miles from Graciosa, Canary Islands.; Mucho Wind!
Arrived Graciosa Canary Is.; 2 1/2 days.; Lots of wind!
